�Grizzltron�



   Grizzltron hears a 'Grrrrr' behind him.  He turned around just as the 
wolf hit him, he flew acrros the cave and landed hard on his back.  He sat 
up and fired 3 Optic blast at Lunarpine's neck as he pulled out his sword. 
"Never attack a bot with a limp," he Mutters.

>From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

>Lunarpine waited till the bot had rounded the corner, he was in the mood 
>for
>a fair hunt and giving Grizzltron a head start seemed sporting enough. He
>transformed to his full wolf mode and raced off after the other bot. He
>rounded the corner as Grizzltron set the second bomb. "Grrrrrrrrrrrr" he
>snarled as he put his head down and dove full force at the bears back.
